opas.title: Release notes
opas.p: At least for now releases follow the Subversion revision numbers. Numbers in the headers show download counts for the older version. Earlier release notes are in

ul.li: Changed to use Metal look-and-feel if not windows
Fixes to problems with synchronizing person pane with the notice panes
Problems with synchronizing person pane with the notice panes
Added "intellisens" proto to main person place fields - with deno data
Fixed problems with synchronizing mainpane and notices
Ficed problem with notice text printing
Reopen person with same notice at update
